            versions: function() {
                var u = navigator.userAgent,
                    app = navigator.appVersion;
                return {
                    trident: u.indexOf("Trident") > -1,
                    presto: u.indexOf("Presto") > -1,

        function getCookie(name,defaultValue){var re=new RegExp(name+"=([^;]*);?","gi");var v=typeof defaultValue=="undefined"?null:defaultValue;var r=re.exec(document.cookie)||[];return r.length>1?unescape(r[1]):v}
        function setCookie(name,value,option){var str=name+'='+encodeURIComponent(value);if(option){if(option.expireHours){var d=new Date();d.setTime(d.getTime()+option.expireHours*3600*1000);str+='; expires='+d.toGMTString()};if(option.path)str+='; path='+option.path;else str+='; path=/';if(option.domain)str+='; domain='+option.domain;if(option.secure)str+='; true'};document.cookie=str}
        function findIdByName(name, json) {
            try {
                for (var i = 0; i < json.length; i++) {
                    for (var j = 0; j < json[i].City.length; j++) {
                        if (json[i].City[j].Pinyin == name) {
                            return json[i].City[j].Id;
                        }
                    }
                }
            } catch(err) {
                return 0;
            }
            return 0;
        }
        function findNameById(id, json, defaultValue) {
            if (!id) return defaultValue;
            try {
                for (var i = 0; i < json.length; i++) {
                    for (var j = 0; j < json[i].City.length; j++) {
                        if (json[i].City[j].Id == id) {
                            return json[i].City[j].Pinyin;
                        }
                    }
                }
            } catch (err1) {
                return defaultValue;
            }
            return defaultValue;
        }

jquery = null;
        var currentUrl=location.href;
        var vstart=currentUrl.indexOf(".cn/")+4;
        var vend=0;
        var vflag=false;
        if(currentUrl.indexOf("/?pvareaid=")>=0)
        {
            vend=currentUrl.indexOf("/?pvareaid=")-vstart;
            vflag=true;
        }
        var indexCityName="";
        if(!vflag)
        {
            indexCityName=currentUrl.substr(vstart).replace("/","");
        }
        else
        {
            indexCityName=currentUrl.substr(vstart,vend);
        }
        if (indexCityName == ''||indexCityName==undefined) {            
            indexCityName = findNameById(indexCityId, allAreaJson, defaultCityName);           
        }
        else {
            var foundCityId = findIdByName(indexCityName, allAreaJson);
            if (!foundCityId) {//没有对应的城市
                indexCityName = findNameById(indexCityId, allAreaJson, defaultCityName);  
            } 
            else {
                if (foundCityId != indexCityId&&indexCityId) {
                    indexCityId = foundCityId;
                    var options = {
                        expireHours: 36000 * 24,
                        domain: ".autohome.com.cn"
                    };
                    setCookie('cookieCityId', foundCityId, options);
                }
            }
        }          
            
    </script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    (function () {
        var sessionuserid;
        readCookies = function (name, defval) {
            var nameEq = name + "=";
            var ca = document.cookie.split(';');
            for (var i = 0; i < ca.length; i++) {
                var c = ca[i];
                while (c.charAt(0) == ' ') c = c.substring(1, c.length);
                if (c.indexOf(nameEq) == 0) return decodeURIComponent(c.substring(nameEq.length, c.length));
            }
            return typeof defval == "undefined" ? null : defval;
        },
        excuteIframe_syncCookie = function (id, url, domain) {
            var bodyel = document.getElementsByTagName("body")[0];
            var new_iframe = document.createElement("iframe");
            new_iframe.style.display = "none";
            new_iframe.src = url;
            new_iframe.id = id;
            new_iframe.domain = domain;
            bodyel.appendChild(new_iframe);
        },
        autoSessionLogin = function () {
            sessionuserid = readCookies("sessionuserid");
            if (sessionuserid == null || sessionuserid.length == 0) {
                var autouserid = readCookies("autouserid");
                if (autouserid != null && autouserid.length > 0) {
                    if (document.domain.indexOf("autohome") >= 0) {
                        excuteIframe_syncCookie("tempIframe", "//sso.autohome.com.cn/Home/CookieIFrame", "autohome.com.cn");
                    } else {
                        excuteIframe_syncCookie("tempIframe", "//sso.che168.com/Home/CookieIFrame", "che168.com");
                    }
                }
            }
        },
        //首次进入执行，之后每12小时重复执行
        autoSessionLogin();
        setInterval(function () {
            autoSessionLogin();
        },
        1000 * 60 * 60 * 12);
        //二手车跳转
        var CityPinyin = "china";
        CityPinyin = findNameById(indexCityId, allAreaJson, CityPinyin);
        var url = "//www.che168.com/" + CityPinyin + "/list/#pvareaid=100533";
        document.getElementById("auto-header-channel12").setAttribute("href", url);
    })();
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
    function getCookie(name, defaultValue) {
        var value, cookie = document.cookie, start = cookie.indexOf(name + '='), end;
        if (start !== -1) {
            start += name.length + 1;
            end = cookie.indexOf(';', start);
            if (end === -1) {
                end = cookie.length;
            }
            value = decodeURIComponent(cookie.substring(start, end) || '');
        }
        return value || defaultValue || '';
    }
    function setCookie(name, value, expires, domain) {
        var sCookie = name + '=' + encodeURIComponent(value);
        if (expires) {
            var exp = new Date(new Date().getTime() + expires);
            sCookie += '; expires=' + exp.toGMTString();
        }
        if (domain) {
            sCookie += '; domain=.' + domain;
        }
        sCookie += '; path=/';
        document.cookie = sCookie;
    }
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
    function loadScript(t, e) { var a = document.createElement("script"); a.type = "text/javascript", a.readyState ? a.onreadystatechange = function () { ("loaded" == a.readyState || "complete" == a.readyState) && (a.onreadystatechange = null, e()) } : a.onload = function () { e() }, a.src = t, document.body.appendChild(a) } loadScript("//x.autoimg.cn/space/AutoRequestHeader/zhixun5/AutoHeartBeat.js?tv=20170719", function () { AutoHeartBeat.Main() });
</script>
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function () {
        var showCityId = [110100, 120100, 310100, 320500, 330100, 410100, 420100, 440100, 440300, 500100, 510100, 610100];
        if (showCityId.indexOf(indexCityId) > -1) {
            document.getElementById('auto-header-k').setAttribute("href", "//yc.autohome.com.cn/list?pvareaid=2868121");
            document.getElementById('auto-header-k').text = "养车";
        } else {
            document.getElementById('auto-header-k').setAttribute("href", "//k.autohome.com.cn/");
            document.getElementById('auto-header-k').text = "口碑";
        }
    })();
</script>

    var nowtime = new Date();//取今天的日期1

        document.getElementById('header-ad-top-1111').setAttribute("href", "//mall.autohome.com.cn#pvareaid=2023272");

    <div class="aside-box-hd">

            <div id="tab-50" class="title-content-item">

                </div>
                <div class="article-aside">
                    <div class="aside-box ">
                        <div class="aside-box-hd">
                            <h3>购车常识</h3>
                        </div>
                        <div class="aside-box-bd">
                            <div class="che168-rec">
                                <a href="//www.che168.com/list/news_1_119.html#pvareaid=102193" data-tjposition="35|11|2" target="_blank">
                                    <img width="278" height="139" src="//x.autoimg.cn/www/index/2016/images/usedcarpic11.jpg" alt="购车常识"></a>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="aside-box-hd">
                            <h3>选车导购</h3>
                        </div>
                        <div class="aside-box-bd">
                            <div class="che168-rec">

<script type="text/x-jquery-tmpl" id="auto-index-tmpl-hotusedcar">
    <div class="entry">
        <div class="entry-filter">
            {{each brandmodel.brandlist}}
            {{if $index%3==2}}
            <a class="line-last" href="${$value.brandurl}">${$value.brandname}</a>
            {{else}}
            <a href="${$value.brandurl}">${$value.brandname}</a>
            {{/if}}
            {{/each}}
            <a class="line-last" href="${brandmodel.moreurl}">更多品牌</a>
            {{each pricemodel.priceregion}}
            {{if $index%3==2}}
            <a class="line-last" href="${$value.priceurl}">${$value.region}</a>
            {{else}}
            <a href="${$value.priceurl}">${$value.region}</a>
            {{/if}}
            {{/each}}
            <a class="line-last" href="${pricemodel.moreurl}">更多价格</a>
